select CASE type WHEN 1 THEN (select friend_name from wx.t_book tb,wx.t_userinfo tu where tb.open_id = tu.openid and tb.phone = s.value and tu.id = s.user_id ) WHEN 2 THEN (select group_name from wx.t_group tg ,wx.t_userinfo tu where tg.open_id = tu.openid and tg.id = s.value and tu.id = s.user_id ) WHEN 3 THEN (select tl.`name` from wx.t_label tl where tl.id = s.value limit 1 ) WHEN 4 THEN (select tl.`name` from wx.t_label tl where tl.id = s.value limit 1 )
ELSE '' END content ,type, s.id,s.operationId ,s.create_time, (select vv.voice_name from wx.t_voice vv where s.voice_id = vv.id) value ,(select cm.business_name from wx.t_voice vv ,wx.t_content cm where vv.business_id = cm.business_id and s.voice_id = vv.id ) filename from wx.t_set s where s.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY operationId desc,type
